Professional Summary: â€¢ 4.10+ years of experience in web-application development involving internet & intranet based portals & CMS driven websites using SharePoint & PHP â€¢ 3.10+ years of experience in developing portals with WSS 3.0 & MOSS 2007 - 1 year of experience in developing CMS driven websites using various open source content management systems like Drupal, Joomla, MediaWiki, WordPress & DotNetNuke â€¢ Good experience in project management activities as a software analyst, design & develop interactive user interfaces for content managed sites â€¢ Experience in web development with strong knowledge in WCM & ECM concepts, customizing & deploying open source web content management systems, Web 2.0 features enabling collaboration & personalization

Goals: â€¢ To be identified as a Technology Specialist in building web-applications with SharePoint, open-source tools and semantic web concepts â€¢ To develop novel collaborative web-solutions that would reach even novice users & get them hooked to such apps â€¢ Specialize in e-commerce applications Specialties

Business requirements analysis - building solutions & effort estimation - web-based application development - MOSS/WSS 3.0, enterprise-wide workflows, AJAX & jQuery, web services, InfoPath, Nintex…
